gfal_testchmod.c

This exemple show how to change the right on a file/directory ex : use case with SRM plugin : ./gfal_testdir srm://grid05.lal.in2p3.fr:8446/dpm/lal.in2p3.fr/home/dteam/test_obiwankenobi

00022 #include <stdio.h>
00023 #include <stdlib.h>
00024 #include <unistd.h>
00025 #include <errno.h>
00026 #include "gfal_api.h"
00027 
00028 main(int argc, char **argv)
00029 {
00030         int mode, error = 0;
00031         char *file;
00032 
00033         if (argc != 3) {
00034                 fprintf (stderr, "usage: %s file mode\n", argv[0]);
00035                 exit (1);
00036         }
00037 
00038         file = argv[1];
00039         mode = strtol (argv[2], NULL, 8);
00040         if (errno > 0) {
00041                 perror ("strtol");
00042                 exit (1);
00043         }
00044 
00045         printf ("Checking RW access to '%s'...\n",file);
00046         if (gfal_access (file, R_OK|W_OK) < 0) {
00047                 error = 1;
00048                 perror ("gfal_access");
00049         }
00050 
00051         printf ("Changing mode of '%s' to %o...\n", file, mode);
00052         if (gfal_chmod (file, mode) < 0) {
00053                 error = 1;
00054                 perror ("gfal_chmod");
00055         }
00056 
00057         if (error) exit (1);
00058 
00059         printf ("All is ok.\n");
00060         exit (0);
00061 }
